channel.title: Authors on ddd3hLab
channel.description: Recent content in Authors on ddd3hLab

item.title: CV
item.description: Jun 2000: Born in Soka City, Saitama Prefecture, Japan. Aug 2014: Supervised the Japanese language of Bluemail, a mailer application for Android (retired in Jan 2017) Mar 2019: Graduated from Kasukabe Kyoei High School 2020 # Apr 2020: Entered Department of Physics, Faculty of Science, Saitama University May 2020: Joined Akatoki1 and CORE2 Oct 2020: Conducted a combustion test of his own rocket engine “LIATRIS.

item.title: Presentation
item.description: Unraveling the Relationship between Ozone and Radiation-ANCO-Project (2022.11) Institute of Space and Astronautical Science, Japan Aerospace Exploration Agency (JAXA)(ISAS) Balloon Symposium FY 2022 (November 7-8, 2022. Hybrid event （JAXA Sagamihara Campus & online))

item.title: R&D
item.description: Research # Simulation Software FROGS Python ver., CORE – (2020) MATLABで既に開発が進んでいた飛翔シュミレーション「FROGS」をPython版で開発を行った。 Study on relationship between tidal force and atmosphereic pressure, Saitama University – (2021) 2021年に投稿した潮汐力と気圧の関係に関する研究。 Development of algorithm for 0m goal of CanSat by various sensors, AKTK – (2022)
